## Installation

### Install from Git

Add the following to shard.yaml

```yaml
dependencies:
  netbox-client:
    github: GIT_USER_ID/GIT_REPO_ID
    version: ~> 1.0.0
```

## Development

Install dependencies

```shell
shards
```

Run the tests:

```shell
crystal spec
```
